author: keturn

hopefully make test_consumer less horrible to deal with. Addressed
small issues that the tests raised.

author: keturn

author: keturn
msg: [python-to-heraldry @ Added magic no_default argument to Message.getArg to make it raise a KeyError when the value is not found.]
